## PackedFormatSpec interface

Format configuration passed to [defPackedFormat](./pixel.defpackedformat.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PackedFormatSpec extends Partial<IABGRConvert<number>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [alpha](./pixel.packedformatspec.alpha.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of alpha channel bits. MUST be given if format uses alpha channel. |
|  [channels](./pixel.packedformatspec.channels.md) | <code>PackedChannelSpec[]</code> | Individual channel configurations |
|  [size](./pixel.packedformatspec.size.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of actual used bits (must be &lt;<!-- -->= <code>size</code>) |
|  [type](./pixel.packedformatspec.type.md) | <code>UintType</code> | Storage / typed array type |
